block_comment: This block of code primarily functions as a conditional data pattern generator with a data width of 128 (DWIDTH). It operates by checking if DWIDTH is set to 128 and if the DATA_PATTERN is set to either "DGEN_WALKING0", "DGEN_WALKING1", or "DGEN_ALL". In the event that both conditions are fulfilled, the labeled block, WALKING_ONE_128_PATTERN, is executed.
